description:
Bizzabo – Event Networking Made Easy! Used by more than 3,000 conferences worldwide!

“Top 10 Best iOS Apps of 2013” - InformationWeek
“Bizzabo is the cure for the crappy event and conference experience” – Ricardo Bilton, Venturebeat
"After demoing Bizzabo I can confidently say it’s one of the best conference apps I’ve seen, and I’ve seen a few" - Mike Butcher, TechCrunch
"My favorite business networking service" - Cheri Macale, TheNextWeb
“Top 20 Hottest Startups from Israel” - BusinessInsider.com

Bizzabo aims to enhance the business discovery and networking experience at events and conferences, and enables event organizers to engage directly with attendees. With Bizzabo it's easier to discover business and networking opportunities in real-time at conferences and events.

"Great app! If you're an event organizer this is a MUST for you"
"Must have app for networking! Very useful and easy to use"

Using Bizzabo you will transform a frustrating, ineffective experience into a seamless and efficient process in which you no longer "stumble upon" opportunities – you find them!

Features for attendees:
* Discover future relevant events, and find out who else will attend
* Get suggestions for people you should meet, tailored by your personal profile or preferences
* Interact with other attendees through in-app messaging and set-up face to face meetings on the spot and see who looked at your profile
* Leverage LinkedIn, Facebook and Twitter to keep in touch with new connections and be part of the buzz
* Access event agenda, speaker bios, session locations, and other event resources right from your phone
* “Like” your favorite speakers, sessions, and partners and share them with your social networks!
* Works Offline. No wifi? No problem! The app works even without an Internet connection

Features for event organizers:
* Easy to setup: Bizzabo is a free solution, allowing you to create and publish your event in 2 min
* Interactivity: communicate with attendees before, during, and after the event
* Social Buzz: Social media integration helps attendees spread the word of your event, which can help increase ticket sales
* Registration Integration: Connect your registration system to send out automated emails to registrants for better app onboarding
* Web Platform: Give your attendees a networking platform that they can access from anywhere- from their laptop to their smartphone
* Promotion Tools: Easy-to-use dashboard provides templates, dedicated event links, and more for quick event promotion
* Reporting and analytics: Get real-time social sharing analytics about your event and see which sessions, attendees, and partners were the most popular
* Sponsor/Exhibitor Space: Promote your sponsors on the app and socialize their presence, connecting them directly with attendees

Want to socialize your event? Get started today: http://www.bizzabo.com/organizers

We would love to hear your ideas and suggestions, email us: feedback@bizzabo.com or via Twitter – we're @Bizzabo
